title: Goner
lyrics:
She didn't know what she was she was doin'
Chasin' a bullet from a gun
She shoulda looked where I was shootin'
Never meant to hurt anyone
I'm an dreamer

And under-thinker

And over-drinker

I'm gettin' meaner

I'm a fall-in-love-er

A bridge-burner

I'm never ever gonna learn



She ain't a sit-around-and-wait-er

Gonna find someone better

Who can love a little stronger

She's a goner



I never questioned her innocence

So point your fingers right here

You don't know what forever is

Until you watch it disappear



I'm an dreamer

And under-thinker

And over-drinker

I'm gettin' meaner

I'm a fall-in-love-er

A bridge-burner

I'm never ever gonna learn



She ain't a sit-around-and-wait-er

Gonna find someone better

Who can love a little stronger

She's a goner



She ain't a sit-around-and-wait-er

Gonna find someone better

Who can love a little stronger

She ain't a sit-around-and-wait-er

Gonna find someone better

Who can love a little stronger

She's a goner

She's a goner

Man, she's a goner
